code: import{AppStateActionTypes}from"./actionTypes";export var SetPageTitle=function SetPageTitle(title){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETPAGETITLE,payload:title};};export var SetPageUrl=function SetPageUrl(url){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETPAGEURL,payload:url};};export var SetMenuCollection=function SetMenuCollection(collection){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETMENUCOLLECTION,payload:collection};};export var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{pageTitle:state.pageTitle,url:state.url,menuCollection:state.menuCollection};};
